snippet: The Boise State star may not be in Trent Richardson's class, but he's capable of having statistical production that is as good or better depending on the team that drafts him.
abstract: The Boise State star may not be in Trent Richardson's class, but he's capable of having statistical production that is as good or better depending on the team that drafts him.

headline.main: Doug Martin, Second-Ranked Running Back in 2012 Draft
